Traffic.RoadNetwork

Class IntersectionBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • Traffic.RoadNetwork.Block
      • Traffic.RoadNetwork.IntersectionBlock

  • public class IntersectionBlock
extends Block
    IntersectionBlock.java - A subclass of the Block class. Intersection Blocks lie at the intersection of the lanes and allow for the vehicles to switch lanes.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • IntersectionBlock

        public IntersectionBlock(int no,
                         IntersectionType type,
                         double turnRate)
        Constructor for class IntersectionBlock. Takes in parameters of an integer representing its Block Number, the type of intersection block it is as the IntersectionType enum class, and a double representing the rate at which a vehicle can turn.
        Parameters:
        no - an integer value representing the number of the Intersection Block.
        type - the type of intersection block it is as the IntersectionType enum class.
        turnRate - turnRate double value from 0 to 1 representing the rate at which a vehicle can turn.
